00039 function __autoload($className)
00040 {
00041         static $baseClasses;
00042     static $hasInited;
00043     static $enableEndorsementManager;
00044     static $endorsementManager;
00045 
00046     /*
00047      * Ελέγχουμε για να δούμε άν έχει ενεργοποιηθεί
00048      * η υποστήριξη του EndorsedManager στο αρχείο
00049      * config.php.
00050      */
00051     if ($hasInited) {
00052         if (leaf_Registry::getInstance()->config['allow_endorsed']=="Yes") 
00053             $enableEndorsementManager = TRUE;
00054         $hasInited=NULL;
00055     }
00056 
00057     /*
00058      * Άν έχει όντως έχει ζητηθεί η υποστήριξη του
00059      * EndorsedManager, τον καλούμε.
00060      */
00061     if ($endorsementManager==NULL && $enableEndorsementManager==TRUE) {
00062         require_once LEAF_BASE . "core/EndorsementManager.php";
00063         leaf_Registry::getInstance()->register(new leaf_EndorsementManager());
00064         $endorsementManager = leaf_Registry::getInstance()->endorse_man;
00065     }
00066         
00067     /*
00068      * Λίστα με -σχεδόν- όλες τις κλάσεις του πυρήνα του
00069      * framework.
00070      */
00071     if ($baseClasses==NULL)
00072         $baseClasses = array (
00073             'leaf_Base'      => 'Base.php',
00074             'leaf_Benchmark' => 'Benchmark.php',
00075                 'leaf_Config'    => 'Config.php',
00076             'leaf_Controller'=> 'Controller.php',
00077             'leaf_Debug'     => 'Debug.php',
00078             'leaf_Dispatcher'=> 'Dispatcher.php',
00079             'leaf_Exception' => 'Exception.php',
00080             'leaf_Hash'      => 'Hash.php',
00081             'leaf_Hook'      => 'hook/Hook.php',
00082             'leaf_Hook_Conditional'=> 'hook/Hook_Conditional.php',
00083             'leaf_Loader'    => 'Loader.php',
00084             'leaf_Locale'    => 'Locale.php',
00085             'leaf_Log'       => 'log/Log.php',
00086             'leaf_Logger'    => 'log/Logger.php',
00087             'leaf_Model'     => 'Model.php',
00088             'leaf_Registry'  => 'Registry.php',
00089             'leaf_Request'   => 'Request.php',
00090             'leaf_Response'  => 'Response.php',
00091             'leaf_Router'    => 'Router.php',
00092             'leaf_View'      => 'View.php'
00093         );
00094 
00095     /*
00096      * Έλεγχος για το άν η κλάση που έχει ζητηθεί είναι
00097      * μέρος του πυρήνα.
00098      */
00099         if (array_key_exists($className, $baseClasses)) {
00100 
00101         /*
00102          * Αφήνουμε την κλάση EndorsedManager να διαχειριστεί
00103          * τις εξωτερικές κλάσεις που υπερκαλύψουν τις κλάσεις
00104          * του πυρήνα.
00105          */
00106         if ($enableEndorsementManager) {
00107             if ($endorsementManager->isEndorsed($className))
00108                 $endorsementManager->loadEndorsedClass($className);
00109             else
00110                 require_once LEAF_BASE
00111                             . 'core/'
00112                             . $baseClasses[$className];
00113         } else {
00114                 require_once LEAF_BASE
00115                         . 'core/'
00116                         . $baseClasses[$className];
00117         }
00118     }
00119     
00120     /*
00121      * Άν έχει καλεστεί η κλάση leaf_Config, 
00122      * μπορούμε να διαβάσουμε τα αρχεία παραμέτρων
00123      * και να αποφασίσουμε άν θα ενεργοποιήσουμε την
00124      * κλάση EndorsedManager ή όχι.
00125      */
00126     if ($className=="leaf_Config")
00127         $hasInited = TRUE;
00128 }

00152 function frameworkSanityCheck($checkAll=false)
00153 {
00154     $msg = array();
00155 
00156     if (extension_loaded('spl')==FALSE) {
00157         $msg[] = "SPL functions are disabled.";
00158     }
00159     
00160     /*
00161      * LEAF_REL_STATUS
00162      */
00163     if (!defined('LEAF_REL_STATUS'))
00164         $msg[] = "No releasing status information found -"
00165                 ."Missing \"LEAF_REL_STATUS\" declaration.\n";
00166 
00167     /*
00168      * LEAF_WORKING_DIR
00169      */
00170     if (!defined('LEAF_WORKING_DIR')) {
00171         $msg[] = "No Working directory is defined - "
00172                 ."Missing \"LEAF_WORKING_DIR\" declaration.\n";
00173     } else {
00174         if (!is_readable(LEAF_WORKING_DIR)) {
00175             $msg[] = "Working directory is NOT readable.\n";
00176         } else {
00177             if (is_writeable(LEAF_WORKING_DIR)) {
00178                 $msg[] = "Working directory IS writeable."
00179                         ."Security issues arise.\n";
00180             }
00181         }
00182     }
00183 
00184     /*
00185      * LEAF_BASE
00186      */
00187     if (!defined('LEAF_BASE')) {
00188         $msg[] = "No leaf Base directory is defined - "
00189                 ."Missing \"LEAF_BASE\" declaration.\n";
00190     } else {
00191         if (!file_exists(LEAF_BASE)) {
00192             $msg[] = "leaf Base directory NOT found.\n";
00193         } else {
00194             if (!is_readable(LEAF_BASE)) {
00195                     $msg[] = "leaf Base directory is NOT readable.\n";
00196                 } else {
00197                     if (is_writeable(LEAF_BASE)) {
00198                         $msg[] = "leaf Base directory IS writeable."
00199                                 ."Security issues arise.\n";
00200                     }
00201                 }
00202         }
00203     }
00204

00206      * LEAF_APPS
00207      */

00209         $msg[] = "No leaf Application directory is defined - "
00210                 ."Missing \"LEAF_APPS\" declaration.\n";
00211     } else {
00212         if (!file_exists(LEAF_APPS)) {
00213             $msg[] = "leaf Application directory NOT found.\n";
00214         } else {
00215             if (!is_readable(LEAF_APPS)) {
00216                     $msg[] = "leaf Application directory is NOT readable.\n";
00217                 }
00218         }
00219 
00220     }
00221     
00222     /*
00223      * LEAF_VAR
00224      */

00226         $msg[] = "No Variable directory is defined - "
00227                 ."Missing \"LEAF_VAR\" declaration.\n";
00228     } else {
00229         if (!is_readable(LEAF_VAR)) {
00230             $msg[] = "Variable directory is NOT readable.\n";

00232             if (is_writable(LEAF_VAR)) {

00234                         ."Security issues arise.\n";
00235             } else {
00236                 
00237                 if (!is_readable(LEAF_VAR . 'cache/')) {
00238                     $msg[] = "Cache directory is NOT readable.\n";

00241                         $msg[] = "Cache directory is NOT writable.\n";
00242                     }
00243                 }

00249                         $msg[] = "Logs directory is NOT writable.\n";
00250                     }

00265                         $msg[] = "Tmp directory is NOT writable.\n";
00266                     }
00267                 }
00268             }
00269         }
00270     }
00271     
00272     if ($checkAll) {
00273             /*
00274              * ETC
00275              */
00276         if (!file_exists(LEAF_BASE . 'Etc/')) {
00277                 $msg[] = "Etc directory NOT found.\n";
00278             } else {
00279                 if (!is_readable(LEAF_BASE . 'Etc/')) {
00280                     $msg[] = "Etc directory is NOT readable.\n";
00281                 }
00282             }
00283             
00284             /*
00285              * CONFIGURATION FILES
00286              */
00287             $configFiles = array (
00288                 "autoload.php", "config.php", "database.php",
00289                 "hooks.php", "routes.php"
00290             );
00291             foreach ($configFiles as $file) {
00292                 if (!file_exists(LEAF_BASE . 'Etc/' . $file)) {
00293                     $msg[] = "Configuration file \"{$file}\", does not exist.\n";
00294                 } else {
00295                     if (!is_readable(LEAF_BASE . 'Etc/' . $file)) {
00296                         $msg[] = "Configuration file \"{$file}\", cannot be read.\n";
00297                     }
00298                 }
00299             }
00300             
00301             unset($configFiles);
00302     }
00303 
00304 
00305     if (sizeof($msg)>0)
00306         showHtmlMessage("Sanity Check Failure", $msg, true);
00307 }
